visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly average temperatures for a year. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The x-axis represents the months of the year, while the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series includes monthly average temperatures for a year, with a custom color applied to the series. Additional configurations include settings for chart margins, background color, and legend hover style.
